parameterDecorators.name: delegatee
parameterDecorators.description: The address to delegate votes to.

functionDecorators.name: delegates
functionDecorators.description: Overrides the standard `Comp.sol` delegates mapping to return the delegator's own address if they haven't delegated. This avoids having to delegate to oneself.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentVotes
functionDecorators.description: Gets the current voting power for `account`.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address to get voting power.

returnDecorators.description: The number of current votes for `account`.

functionDecorators.name: votesToDelegate
functionDecorators.description: The votes a delegator can delegate.
